events.message: We have successfully received the candidate's application for the software engineer position and will begin review.
The candidate's application has been categorised under Engineering based on their experience with software development.
A recruiter with engineering hiring expertise has been assigned to the candidate to manage the recruitment process.
The recruiter conducted an initial screening call to discuss the candidate’s background and assess their fit for the engineering role.
The candidate responded positively to the screening call and expressed strong interest in proceeding with technical interviews.
A technical interview has been scheduled with the engineering team for the candidate on May 5th at 10 AM UTC.
The candidate completed the technical interview and demonstrated strong problem-solving skills and coding proficiency.
Following the successful technical interview, an HR interview has been scheduled to discuss the candidate’s fit within company culture.
The candidate had a positive HR interview, showing strong alignment with the company's values and work environment.
An offer has been proposed to the candidate including compensation and benefits aligned with their experience level.
The candidate provided positive feedback on the offer and expressed enthusiasm about joining the engineering team.
The candidate has officially accepted the offer and is looking forward to starting their new role as software engineer.
The onboarding process has started, including access to development environments and orientation sessions for the new engineer.
The hiring process has been successfully completed with the candidate fully onboarded and integrated into the engineering team.
